titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd at Oxford, before Sir. Will. Walker, Mayor of the said city, upon the 26th of July 1685 being the day of thanksgiving for the defeat of the rebels in Monmouth's rebellion / by Charles Allestree ...
titleStmt.author: Allestree, Charles, 1653 or 4-1707.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
